articles.description: England beat India in 2nd ODI: Poor show by Indian spinners, England chase down 337 in 43.3 overs; level series 1-1
articles.content: England beat India in 2nd ODI: Poor show by Indian spinners, England chase down 337 in 43.3 overs; level series 1-1: Ben Stokes’ swashbuckling 99 and in-form England opener Jonny Bairstow’s 112-ball … [+4330 chars]
